name: Mech Crusade
storyline: In Mech Crusade you play a mech-piloting mercenary sent to destabilize the continent of Merica in preparation for the upcoming Swiss invasion. You will have to navigate the world map and deal with different, competing factions and their own internal conflicts. You have the option of piloting one of five different mechs and the choice of many different weapons to help you in your task. The missions you take will affect the general course of the story and the fate of Merica.
summary: Mech Crusade is a 90's-inspired mech simulator set in the post-apocalyptic land of 2199 Merica. You have a choice of multiple different mechs, weapons, and branching, nonlinear missions. Take contracts. Blow things up. Rake in the moolah.
